attributes.action: make a true statement about "Mystery Flights" (of rendition) as per the BBC documentary of 24 May 2007
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BBC Documentary "Mystery Flights" was a shocking accusation of inhumanity by so called civilised states, including the UK by complicity.  The government should make a statement declaring it's position on Rendition and Torture and whether the accusations are true.  Will the government consider issuing warrants for War Crimes against those involved as other European States have done?
